item.title: Build on Akamai | Linode
item.description: TL;DR This short article explains why I chose Hugo as developing technology to build my personal website, what Hugo is, who Hugo is for, and the details of my website. Why I Chose Hugo There are mainly four reasons why I used Hugo to build my personal website. Open-source. Hugo is an open-source technology that allows anyone to create a static site. Therefore, the code is maintained by a community of developers and other contributors which consequently will make it performant and more secure.
